Title: Using a StackHut Service
Description:
In this screencast we show how you can easily make use of a StackHut service in your own code - a platform we've been hacking on for deploying local code as live APIs in the cloud.

More details can be found in the tutorial.

Check the associated screencast to see how you can create a StackHut service.

Give it a try at StackHut and let us know how you get on :).
